description: Add a display unit of measure to a job production plan
permissions: Allowed when the user is authorized to create/update the related job production plan via JobProductionPlanDisplayUnitOfMeasurePolicy (delegated to JobProductionPlanPolicy).
side_effects: Creates a job production plan display unit of measure record.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --unit-of-measure are required. Unit of measure must be unique per job production plan and must have a metric of area, mass, or volume. Importance position is a 0-based index when provided.

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.validation: Required. Must be unique per job production plan; unit of measure metric must be area, mass, or volume.
